name: Neon dice
description:
CONTROLS P1 : 
• Move : WASD / ZQSD (respectively for Qwerty / Azerty config
• Attack : C
• Yeet stance : V

CONTROLS P2: 
• Move : Arrow keys 
• Attack : L
• Yeet stance : K
———————————————
MAIN MECHANIC : 

When a dice is thrown, their attack is randomly changed and fully reloaded ! Therefore you must cooperate to overcome the hazards on your way.

To be thrown and reroll (and therefore reload your attacks), you must run into your buddy while they waiting in Yeet Stance. The launcher choose the throwing direction.
———————————————
SYNOPSIS :

In this cute co-op dungeon crawler, you embody two cute dices lost in a mysterious synthwave-inspired dungeon.  You must cooperate in order to get through this dangerous adventure by defeating monster and throwing regularly your partner ! But beware, each time you get thrown, your attack is randomly changed ! Adapt and team up in order to overcome this challenge !
